agent_instructions.goal: Scaffold a complete research-grade web scraping infrastructure with separate backend and frontend containers.

file_system_blueprint.description: Docker image for Python + Playwright support
file_system_blueprint.content_instruction: Use 'mcr.microsoft.com/playwright/python:v1.41.0-jammy' as base. Set workdir to /app. Copy requirements.txt, pip install, install 'chromium' browser via playwright. Expose port 8000. Command: uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --reload.

Create a FastAPI app instance. Add CORS middleware allowing '*'. Create a root endpoint '/' returning {'status': 'URWA Brain Online'}. Create a dummy endpoint POST '/api/v1/scrape' that accepts a URL string.

Import Playwright's async_playwright. Define a class 'StealthScraper'. Method 'scrape(url)' should launch a chromium browser (headless=True), create a context with a fake User-Agent, goto the URL, and return page.content().
From nginx:alpine. Copy ./html to /usr/share/nginx/html. Copy nginx.conf to /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf.
Server block listening on 80. Location / points to root /usr/share/nginx/html. Location /api/ proxies pass to http://backend:8000.
HTML5 Boilerplate. Title: 'URWA Control Deck'. Include a centered Input Box for URL and a 'Launch Agent' button. Add a <div id='logs'> for displaying output.
Version 3.8. Service 'backend': build ./backend, ports 8000:8000, env_file .env, ipc: host. Service 'frontend': build ./frontend, ports 80:80, depends_on backend.
